post:
Hot on the heels of our latest deployment in Amsterdam, Netherlands, Europe!, we are happy to announce another deployment in Europe –  the great city of Frankfurt, Germany!

![](http://news.dediserve.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/frankfurt.jpg)

Based on extensive customer feedback and as part of our continuing global roll out we are delighted to now go live in Frankfurt.

With fantastic latency across all of Western and Central Europe, Frankfurt is on the worlds major peering points for all Internet traffic and geographically placed close to the heart of Europe.

Until 1700GMT, Friday the 14th of November 2014, a special sub $7 deal for LET 
https://manage.dediserve.com/index.php?cmd=module&module=54&cid=500

Included at no additional charge – per server you build:

    100Mbps Uplinks, Free 1Gbps Private LAN, Firewalls
    1.5TB Outbound transfer per GB of RAM, Free Inbound
    Snapshot Backup and Custom Template Engine
    24 / 7 / 365 Comprehensive Support
    Permanent KVM console to all servers
    Global AnyCast DNS Platform
    Comprehensive API, iOS and Android Apps
    Free access to our Global CDN with true PAYG

Check out the details here: http://news.dediserve.com

And our extensive roadmap of currently live and in progress sites at http://dediserve.com/locations

Coming soon: Hong Kong, Jakarta, Singapore, Bucharest and more!
